QuestData.Title: Where Dragons Fell
QuestData.Description: A whole brood of blue dragons fell here. And now, one by one, they're being raised by his servants.$B$BHe raised the biggest of them all himself. Bring me some bone dust from the whelps and I'll show you exactly how he did it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Matthias Lehner at Sindragosa's Fall wants you to obtain 6 Whelp Bone Dusts.
QuestData.RewardText: Even the mighty wyrms had to heed his call. How is a simple mortal like you going to resist him?
